scripts.install: npm i opusscript@latest node-opus@latest axios@latest body-parser@latest discord.js@latest dotenv@latest emoji-regex@latest express@latest fs@latest ffmpeg-stream@latest is-url@latest moment@latest mongoose@latest ms-to-timecode@latest sourcebin@latest string-placeholder@latest ytdl-core@latest ytpl@latest ytsr@latest ent@latest request@latest sec2human@latest m3u8stream@latest child_process@latest axios@latest @discordjs/voice@latest tweetnacl@latest topgg-autoposter@latest systeminformation@latest short-uuid@latest discord-api-types@latest @discordjs/rest@latest cross-fetch@latest hash-wasm@latest zlib-sync@latest erlpack@latest bufferutil@latest utf-8-validate@latest
scripts.uninstall: npm uni opusscript node-opus uninstall axios body-parser discord.js dotenv emoji-regex express fs ffmpeg-stream is-url moment mongoose ms-to-timecode sourcebin string-placeholder ytdl-core ytpl ytsr ent request sec2human m3u8stream child_process topgg-autoposter systeminformation @discordjs/voice axios tweetnacl short-uuid discord-api-types @discordjs/rest cross-fetch hash-wasm zlib-sync erlpack bufferutil utf-8-validate
